resources.string:
Hi, my name is Jonny. 

I love Llamas. 

The kind that is alive and jumps around in an amazon or valley, or at a petting zoo, and definitely the mountains. 
Fun fact is that I have several llamas i keep in a small box. 

I like eating llama, too. Raw llama. Grilled llama. Smoked llama. Poached llama - not so much. 
And sometimes I even go llama tipping. 
And even less sometimes, I actually catch one. 

Once, when I was camping in Peru, and very hungry, I even caught a large llama with my hands. 

I'll be happy to teach you how to make your own box o' llamas. 
You should ask someone else about llama hunting, though.
